#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <map>
using namespace std;
long l,t,z,r,j;
string s,a;
map <string,int> b;

int main() {
 scanf("%d", &t);
 for (long q=1; q<=t; q++) {
  cin>>s;
  l=s.size();
  for (long i=1; i<=l; i++) {
   j=0;
   while (r<l) {
     r=j+i;
     a=s.substr(j,i);
     b[a]++;
     j++;
     }
    r=0;
    }
      printf("%d\n", b.size());
  b.clear();
   }

 return 0;
}
